name: TheHive
description: TheHive is a scalable, open source and free Security Incident Response Platform

options.name: TheHive URL
options.description: The URL path to TheHive instance - i.e. http://<host>:9000

options.name: Ignored List
options.description: List of domains and IPs that you never want to send to TheHive

options.name: Ignore Domain Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up (if blank, no domains will be ignored)

options.name: Create Case
options.description: Allows user to create a case for an indicator that does not have one

options.name: Ignore IP Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up (if blank, no IPs will be ignored)
